summary: This appears to be a repository inquiry form from the FBI to the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, requesting criminal history information for an individual as part of an FBI investigation (Case No. SOD-NY-3027571). The document is part of a series of related forms.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the contact/recipient for the FBI's repository inquiry regarding criminal history information.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The FBI (Special Agent case SOD-NY-3027571) is conducting an investigation requiring a criminal history check from New York State authorities.
The request is directed to the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services, specifically to Executive Deputy Commissioner Michael C. Green.
The document is part of a sequence of related forms, numbered EFTA00155339 through EFTA00155342.
The FBI case number referenced is 827488XB3 - CRI.
